channel.title: So, wanna have fun now?
channel.description:
Hello users of moparisthebest.com, do you guys like gfx? moparscape?, programming? Well then join http://gfxcity.com. (approved by pwnd) we have our own chat channel, a blog, and forums! WE had 10 members and newb 2341 is a gm, and no other mods! So you have a chance to get a mod! So please join! http://forums.gfxcity.com (forums) http://chat.gfxcity.com/tinc?key=GgWgHEI4&channel=187832 http://blog.gfxcity.com (blog) http://gfxcity.com (home page made by me :D)
We are having an sotw very, very soon. Have fun ;) Only one ad on one page? ask why? because my hosting cost $10 a month, but on posts or threads = no ads, only in the index.php
and try registering under newb 2341? i will just delete the account

item.title: So, wanna have fun now?
item.dc:creator: @fellixombc fellixombc
item.description:
@fellixombc wrote:

[quote=“ThugLife, post:9, topic:136561”]Fellix, what i just said was nothing against you’re site, i was saying im only annoyed when people do that.

and what i said about it being approved was to this question[quote author=Ultimacool link=topic=188086.msg1698337#msg1698337 date=1187990920]
Are we allowed to advertise now?
[/quote][/quote]
i know, i agree they’re should be less threads…
COME ON guys we need more members

Read full topic

item.title: So, wanna have fun now?
item.dc:creator: @tL tL
item.description:

Fellix, what i just said was nothing against you’re site, i was saying im only annoyed when people do that.

and what i said about it being approved was to this question[quote=“Ultimacool, post:4, topic:136561”]Are we allowed to advertise now?[/quote]

item.title: So, wanna have fun now?
item.dc:creator: @fellixombc fellixombc
item.description:
@fellixombc wrote:

[quote=“ThugLife, post:7, topic:136561”]No, you’re not allowed to advertise without permission.

The only type of advertisements i don’t like, is when people make an exact copy of mopar then advertise it on this forum.[/quote]
the site is approved…
and does my forums look like exact copy of mopar? no, it has a bigger graphics section

Read full topic
